DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this trial is to guarantee a follow-up of all stroke and transient ischemic attack (TIA) patients. With this follow-up assessment long term effects of therapy and prevention measures can be detected and monitored. It is part of quality assurance.
DOC.detailed_description: Primary efficacy endpoint: Number of patients who state that they received all the information they want about the causes and nature of their illness Key secondary endpoint(s): Compliance/adherence with discharge medication. Re-events. Degree of Disability. Activities of daily living. Mortality.
